flowRoot.flowPara: B1--B8 are bottlenecks with size N happening independently in each hair. The (single) frequency just before these bottlenecks is a mixture of cheek and blood in proportion f and 1-f.

flowPara.flowSpan: B0 is a bottleneck with size N1. The frequency just before this bottleneck is a mixture of cheek and blood in proportion f and 1-f.

flowRoot.flowPara: B1--B8 are bottlenecks with size N2 happening independently in each hair. The frequency just before these bottlenecks is produced by the bottleneck B0.
